sentences.en: After the war, they were shot for hoarding.
sentences.cn: 战后他们因囤积而被枪决.

sentences.en: Already, there are signs that people are hoarding gold.
sentences.cn: 已经有迹象显示越南人民开始储备黄金.

sentences.en: Bankers themselves deny the charge that they are hoarding capital.
sentences.cn: 银行家们否认他们在储藏资金.

sentences.en: But much later, Beowulf is killed by a treasure - hoarding dragon.
sentences.cn: 但许久之后, 贝奥武夫却被一条屯聚财宝的恶龙攻击而丧命.

sentences.en: But this sort of hoarding is extremely rare.
sentences.cn: 但是这种蓄藏金钱的情形极为罕见.

sentences.en: Her only interest is hoarding money.
sentences.cn: 她唯一的兴趣就是攒钱.

sentences.en: I knew Po Ku was hoarding a tin of cocoa in his hut.
sentences.cn: 我知道博古家里还藏着一罐可可.

sentences.en: Not all we see is worth hoarding.
sentences.cn: 并非我们所见到的一切都值得储藏.

sentences.en: People found hoarding ( food ) during the famine were punished.
sentences.cn: 在荒时期屯积 ( 食物 ) 的人受到了惩罚.

sentences.en: People found hoarding during the famine were punished.
sentences.cn: 在饥荒时期屯积的人受到了惩罚.

sentences.en: Refrigeration project mainly applies to process food and hoarding enterprises.
sentences.cn: 冷冻工程服务于食品加工、贮藏企业.

sentences.en: The price hike in garlic was mainly caused by hoarding and profiteering.
sentences.cn: 大蒜价格的疯涨主要是由一些人的囤积居奇引起的.

sentences.en: Then there was the international monetary crisis and the hoarding of gold.
sentences.cn: 接下来是国际货币危机和黄金储备.

sentences.en: There may be a mini - bubble in commodities, additionally inflated by Chinese hoarding.
sentences.cn: 大宗商品市场可能出现了小型泡沫, 而中国的囤货行为又进一步刺激了泡沫的膨胀.

sentences.en: Trading in such contracts encourages hoarding, thereby raising prices, the politicians allege.
sentences.cn: 政客们认为,这种交易会促进商人囤积, 从而引发价格上扬.
